description: Variation of Condition 2 of approved planning permission 2776/19: amend the description to: 'Part demolition of existing retail (A1), office (B1), flats (C3) and place of worship (D1) structure. Extension and change of use to create five storey building with basement and new shopfront containing restaurant (A3) and an 76 bedroom apart-hotel (C1)'. Internal alterations. Alterations to fenestrations. (Summary).
